internal.item: The extern "C" has been moved to prevent errors with template specialization.

fix.item: The integrands for the energy density and internal energy density have been fixed.

new.item: The sourceforge web site for this project now uses Allura.

fix.item: The code now uses extern "C" for C++ compilers.

new.item: The API now includes default integrands to compute the internal energy density (which differs from the default energy density in that it does not include the rest mass).

fix.item: The check on looked up quantity in computation of integrand value was improved (fixes 3520123).

new.item: The API now includes routines to set the upper limit for quantity integrals.
The API now includes routines to copy a fermion or a boson.

fix.item: Default boson integrals now correctly return zero when rest mass and integration variable are both zero.
The examples Makefile has been cleaned up.
The Thomas-Fermi example has been cleaned up and made more compliant with the API.

new.item: Code now computes number density for zero rest mass fermions directly from integrated function.

reorganization.item: Restriction that fermion number density be non-zero has been removed.

new.item: Code is now hosted at SourceForge.net.
The examples/ directory now includes a regression test script generator.

reorganization.item: Examples directory has moved to same level as src/.
Example codes now have descriptive names.

fix.item: Documentation has been corrected to state that computeChemicalPotential() routines return mu/kT.
Unreliable floating point comparisons have been fixed.
gsl-config --cflags has been added to allow examples Makefile to find gsl includes.

reorganization.item: Creation of tmp directory for examples is now automatic.

fix.item: Prototypes on accessor functions have been changed for better const correctness. This is a backwards-compatible change.
